page.title: 20Local Newspaper:Chinnor
page.content: Chinnor has its own community newspaper-The Chinnor Roundabout-which has replaced a former journal published for some years under the name of the Chinnor Chronicle. The newspaper performs a most useful function, conveying amongst other things news of local events and issues including the proceedings of the Parish Council. Credits Information was gathered by the 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th Year children from Mill Lane County Primary School, Chinnor. Their teachers were: Mr E. Thompson, Mrs J.Harris, Mr R. Griffiths and Mr J.Batey. Text edited by Mr J.Batey with the assistance of Mr H.A.Head who also{ entered the information into the computer. Slides by Mr E.Thompson.
